title: Mastering Science Learning Strategies: Short-Term Intensive Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational university-level science knowledge and experience in drafting basic academic plans
context.additional_context: Blended classes in BYOD environments emphasizing strategies to maximize learning efficiency for science majors through integrated online-offline activities

learning_goals: Learners can apply four core learning strategies (time management, active note-taking, exam preparation, scientific paper writing) to actual science assignments
Learners use eight sub-strategies (goal setting, maintaining focus, utilizing feedback, etc.) to establish a personal learning plan within a week and document reflections in a journal
Learners can analyze peer applications of learning strategies through peer reviews and propose at least three improvement suggestions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
